TopicTitle: Unable to 'Run test' on LY-10 Small landing gear contract

Articles.Content:
I accepted the contract to test the LY-10 Small landing gear in orbit around Kerbin in a previous version of KSP (0.25). As I got the newer version (1.0.5.1024), I transferred the save-file as to not lose my progress. 
But trying to perform the test now, the option to 'Run test' does not appear in the context menu for the part, eventhough all requirements are fulfilled. And can therefore not complete the contract. 
If I remember correctly the part had a different name, "Small gear bay", in the previous version. 

The contract gives plenty of science and I'd rather not decline it.

Anybody have any helpful advice?
